name: Siesta (Rockateer)
description:
Created for Global Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours.

An office worker lives the same day over and over for most of his life, one lazy day at his desk he falls asleep and dreams of his lost passion.

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

SPACE - Jump

LMB - Start Game

CTRL + W - Close Application

Mouse - Look

Credits

William Edwards - Lead Developer

Luke Shanks - Modelling

Richerd Jospeh - Design, Music
